newsitem.title: CANADA: Quebec sees Q1 deficit in line with 96/97 forecast.
newsitem.headline: Quebec sees Q1 deficit in line with 96/97 forecast.

text.p: The government of Quebec said on Friday that budget figures for the first fiscal quarter ended June 30 showed it remained on track to meet its C$3.3 billion deficit target for 1996/97.

In a statement, the finance department said revenues fell by 2.9 percent in the first quarter of fiscal 1996/97 compared with the year earlier quarter, while spending dropped 2.4 percent, but it gave no figures.
